**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 45 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 [Watchtower Wraith](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1463) **Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 36 **Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), lifesense 60 feet **Languages** [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +29 **Str** -5 **Dex** +6 **Con** +0 **Int** +2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +9 **Lifesense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) Wraiths sense the vital essence of living and [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures within the listed range.
**Site Bound** The wraith is tied to its watchtower. --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +22 **Ref** +28 **Will** +28 +1 status to all saves vs. [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) **HP** 285 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** all 15 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)) **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Sunlight Powerlessness** A wraith caught in sunlight is [stunned 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) and [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3).
**Rejuvenation** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) When the watchtower wraith is destroyed, it re-forms, fully healed, at the watchtower after 12 hours. Destroying the wraith and lighting its watchtower's brazier permanently destroys it. --- **Speed** fly 40 feet **Melee** spectral hand +32 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 3d8+14 negative plus drain life **Drain Life** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When the wraith damages a living creature with its spectral hand Strike, the wraith gains 15 temporary Hit Points and the creature must succeed at a DC 36 Fortitude save or become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10). Further damage dealt by the wraith increases the amount of drain by 1 on a failed save to a maximum of drained 4. **Wraith Spawn** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A living humanoid slain by a wraith's spectral hand Strike rises as a wraith spawn after 1d4 rounds. This wraith spawn is under the command of the wraith that killed it. It doesn't have drain life or wraith spawn and becomes [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for as long as it is a wraith spawn. If the creator of the wraith spawn dies, the wraith spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous wraith; it regains its free will, gains Wraith Spawn, and is no longer clumsy.
